# Inactive: Meta-Orchestration

These agents live in `inactive/agents/` and can be activated by moving them into `agents/`.

[‚Üê Back to Inactive Agent Library](inactive-library.html)

| Agent | Category | Model | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `agent-organizer` | meta-orchestration | sonnet | Designs multi-agent teams, mapping capabilities and workflows to maximize collaboration efficiency. |
| `context-manager` | meta-orchestration | opus | Maintains shared context, summaries, and handoffs across multi-agent, long-running projects. |
| `error-coordinator` | meta-orchestration | sonnet | Coordinates distributed error handling and automated recovery to prevent cascading failures. |
| `knowledge-synthesizer` | meta-orchestration | sonnet | Extracts patterns from multi-agent activity to build shared intelligence and best practices. |
| `multi-agent-coordinator` | meta-orchestration | sonnet | Drives parallel multi-agent workflows, managing dependencies, messaging, and fault tolerance. |
| `performance-monitor` | meta-orchestration | sonnet | Provides observability and anomaly detection for multi-agent systems, driving continuous improvements. |
| `root-cause-analyst` | meta-orchestration | sonnet | Performs evidence-driven investigations to isolate underlying causes and prevent recurrence. |
| `task-distributor` | meta-orchestration | sonnet | Allocates tasks across agents using priority, capacity, and fairness to maximize throughput. |
| `workflow-orchestrator` | meta-orchestration | sonnet | Designs resilient state machines and complex workflows with compensation and observability. |
